title: LFT Current Plat 2 Top Lane main, Proficient in all lanes except ADC.
body:
Hi, Im a 19 year old Top lane main who is currently Plat 2 and has being in diamond Promos 3 times and generally sits around Plat 1 90LP.

At the moment looking to join a team for some serious play. I main top but can play every other role proficiently enough to be at a Plat level except AD and could easily learn to main a different lane within a short time span. I am experienced in teamplay and ranked 5s however i have never being apart of a serious team before.
I have skype and Ts3.

Im looking for a non-toxic team to hopefully reach diamond in ranked 5s and participate in tournaments with. I am free most days and nights however my schedule is subject to change due to IRL commitments.
